casebody.data:
John FARMER
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 13, 2016

Mary Boehlert, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Lisa Herskowitz, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner John Farmer's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 165 Conn.App. 455, 139 A.3d 767 (2016), is denied.
